item.title: jmeter+grafana+influxdb可视化性能监控平台
item.author: 作者
item.description: 1、安装influxdb 1 2 3 4 docker search influx docker pull influxdb docker run --name my_influ -p 8086:8086 influxdb docker exec -it my_influ /bin/bash 创建数据库 1 2 3 4 influx create database jmeter show databases exit 2、安装grafana 1 2 3 docker search grafana docker pull grafana/grafana
